BAD_REQUEST: The request could not be understood by the server.
UNAUTHORIZED: You are not authorized to view this resource.
FORBIDDEN: Access to this resource is forbidden.
NOT_FOUND: The requested resource could not be found.
NOT_ACCEPTABLE: The requested resource is not acceptable.
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: Too many requests. Please try again later.
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED: The requested method is not allowed.
MICRO_METHOD_NOT_FOUND: The micro method could not be found.
MICRO_SERVICE_NOT_FOUND: The micro service could not be found.
